# updateAction

**Instance Property**

The action being performed on the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var updateAction: NSCollectionView.UpdateAction { get }
```

## Discussion

For a list of relevant actions, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCollectionView/UpdateAction].

## Accessing the Item Changes

- **indexPathBeforeUpdate**: The index path of the item before the update.
- **indexPathAfterUpdate**: The index path of the item after the update.
- **NSCollectionView.UpdateAction**: Constants indicating the type of action being performed on an item.
- **NSCollectionView.ScrollDirection**: Constants indicating the scrolling direction for the layout.
